reviewText: i haven't watched the anime i plan on buying it But ive read the manga and it is awesome its about a boy (Daisuke) who on his 14th birthday discovers that he is the legendary phantom thief dark and the only way for him not to turn into dark is if the girl he loves loves him back but she also has to know about him being dark but the girl he loves hates dark and thinks he is a pervert and it is an AWESOME Manga XD

I'm not sure about the other D.N.Angel complete, but this one has 3 discs and it is complete series. This story is mostly about a boy is about during his 14th birthday, he will change into Dark through generation. Somehow, he change to a different person and he has a black wings like an angel, but is a phantom thief. One of the girl he love has fell in love with his dark side and other sister is a twin love him. I have seen this since I was young and I kind of get addicted to this at first because you know it is like he has to hide his identity, but there is a guy who always think he is Dark. I think both the opening and ending songs are good and the story is ok, but I don't like the ending though. This is the same as the other D.N.Angel complete but has 3 discs from 1-26 episodes.D.N. Angel - Complete Collection
